aws:RequestTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters actions based on the presence of tag key-value pairs in the request

aws:ResourceTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters actions based on tag key-value pairs attached to the resource

aws:TagKeys.description: Filters access based on the presence of tag keys in the request

dms:certTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access based on the presence of tag keys in the request for Certificate

dms:endpointTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access based on the presence of tag keys in the request for Endpoint

dms:esTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access based on the presence of tag keys in the request for EventSubscription

dms:repTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access based on the presence of tag keys in the request for ReplicationInstance

dms:reqTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access based on the presence of tag key-value pairs in the request

dms:subgrpTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access based on the presence of tag keys in the request for ReplicationSubnetGroup

dms:taskTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access based on the presence of tag keys in the request for ReplicationTask
